package.description: This package contains the latest code from CWiid, a Linux Nintendo Wiimote interface. This ROS package does not modify CWiid in any way; it simply provides a convenient way to download and compile the library in a way that can be managed by the ROS dependency system. Currently upstream revision r201 is being provided.
